Events that occurred on 28 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien applies at the Oxford recruiting office to join the army.
1915 - Scholar and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien Przemyslaw Mroczkowski is born.
1922 - Actor Erik Bauersfeld is born.
1919 - The Treaty of Versailles is signed and the First World War officially ends.
1981 - The seventeenth episode of the 1981 radio series of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
1982 - Artist Ray Dillon is born.
2000 – The Tolkien Ensemble publish their second album, A Night in Rivendell.
2009 - The Inklings of Oxford: C. S. Lewis, J. R. R. Tolkien, and Their Friends is published.

content.title: References
